verses.verse: Then the <S%H5029>prophets<s%>, <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5029>prophet<s%>, and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%>, <S%H5013>prophesied<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> that were in <S%H3061>Judah<s%> and <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H8036>name<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel<s%>, even <S%H5922>unto<s%> them.

<S%H116>Then<s%> rose <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H2217>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H7598>Shealtiel<s%>, and <S%H3443>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H3136>Jozadak<s%>, and <S%H8271>began<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> which is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>: and with <S%H5974>them<s%> were the <S%H5029>prophets<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H5583>helping<s%> them.

At the same <S%H2166>time<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> to them <S%H8674>Tatnai<s%>, <S%H6347>governor<s%> on this <S%H5675>side<s%> the <S%H5103>river<s%>, and <S%H8370>Shetharboznai<s%>, and their <S%H3675>companions<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> unto <S%H5922>them<s%>, <S%H4479>Who<s%> hath <S%H7761>commanded<s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%>, and to make <S%H3635>up<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H846>wall<s%>?

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H560>said<s%> we unto them after this <S%H3660>manner<s%>, <S%H4479>What<s%> <S%H581>are<s%> the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> that <S%H1124>make<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1147>building<s%>? make: Chaldee, build

But the <S%H5870>eye<s%> of their <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews<s%>, that they could <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H989>cause<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> to <S%H989>cease<s%>, <S%H5705>till<s%> the <S%H2941>matter<s%> <S%H1946>came<s%> to <S%H1868>Darius<s%>: and <S%H116>then<s%> they returned <S%H8421>answer<s%> by <S%H5407>letter<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> matter.

The <S%H6573>copy<s%> of the <S%H104>letter<s%> that <S%H8674>Tatnai<s%>, <S%H6347>governor<s%> on this <S%H5675>side<s%> the <S%H5103>river<s%>, and <S%H8370>Shetharboznai<s%>, and his <S%H3675>companions<s%> the <S%H671>Apharsachites<s%>, which were on this <S%H5675>side<s%> the <S%H5103>river<s%>, <S%H7972>sent<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>:

They <S%H7972>sent<s%> a <S%H6600>letter<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> him, <S%H1459>wherein<s%> was <S%H3790>written<s%> <S%H1836>thus<s%>; Unto <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H8001>peace<s%>. wherein: Chaldee, in the midst whereof

Be it <S%H1934>known<s%> <S%H3046><s%> unto the <S%H4430>king<s%>, that we <S%H236>went<s%> into the <S%H4083>province<s%> of <S%H3061>Judea<s%>, to the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H426>God<s%>, which is <S%H1124>builded<s%> with <S%H1560>great<s%> <S%H69>stones<s%>, and <S%H636>timber<s%> is <S%H7761>laid<s%> in the <S%H3797>walls<s%>, and <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H5673>work<s%> <S%H5648>goeth<s%> <S%H629>fast<s%> on, and <S%H6744>prospereth<s%> in their <S%H3028>hands<s%>. great: Chaldee, stones of rolling

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H7593>asked<s%> we <S%H479>those<s%> <S%H7868>elders<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%> unto them <S%H3660>thus<s%>, <S%H4479>Who<s%> <S%H7761>commanded<s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%>, and to make <S%H3635>up<s%> <S%H1836>these<s%> <S%H846>walls<s%>?

We <S%H7593>asked<s%> their <S%H8036>names<s%> <S%H638>also<s%>, to <S%H3046>certify<s%> thee, that we might <S%H3790>write<s%> the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> that were the <S%H7217>chief<s%> of them.

And <S%H3660>thus<s%> they <S%H8421>returned<s%> us <S%H6600>answer<s%>, <S%H560>saying<s%>, <S%H586>We<s%> <S%H1994>are<s%> the <S%H5649>servants<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> and <S%H772>earth<s%>, and <S%H1124>build<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> that <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H1124>builded<s%> <S%H1836>these<s%> <S%H7690>many<s%> <S%H8140>years<s%> <S%H6928>ago<s%>, which a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel<s%> <S%H1124>builded<s%> and set <S%H3635>up<s%>.

<S%H3861>But<s%> <S%H4481>after<s%> that our <S%H2>fathers<s%> had <S%H7265>provoked<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> unto <S%H7265>wrath<s%>, he <S%H3052>gave<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> into the <S%H3028>hand<s%> of <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>, the <S%H3679>Chaldean<s%>, who <S%H5642>destroyed<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%>, and <S%H1541>carried<s%> the <S%H5972>people<s%> <S%H1541>away<s%> into <S%H895>Babylon<s%>.

<S%H1297>But<s%> in the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon<s%> the same <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%>.

And the <S%H3984>vessels<s%> <S%H638>also<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> <S%H1722>gold<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%>, which <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H5312>took<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> that was in <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H2987>brought<s%> them into the <S%H1965>temple<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>, <S%H1994>those<s%> did <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5312>take<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>, and they were <S%H3052>delivered<s%> unto one, whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar<s%>, whom he had <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H6347>governor<s%>; governor: or, deputy

And <S%H560>said<s%> unto him, <S%H5376>Take<s%> <S%H412>these<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%>, <S%H236>go<s%>, <S%H5182>carry<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> into the <S%H1965>temple<s%> that is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>, and let the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> be <S%H1124>builded<s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> his <S%H870>place<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> the <S%H1791>same<s%> <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar<s%>, and <S%H3052>laid<s%> the <S%H787>foundation<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> which is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>: and <S%H4481>since<s%> that <S%H116>time<s%> even <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H3705>now<s%> hath it been in <S%H1124>building<s%>, and yet it is <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H8000>finished<s%>.

<S%H3705>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H2006>if<s%> it seem <S%H2869>good<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, let there be <S%H1240>search<s%> made in the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H1596>treasure<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%>, which is <S%H8536>there<s%> at <S%H895>Babylon<s%>, <S%H2006>whether<s%> it <S%H383>be<s%> so, that a <S%H2942>decree<s%> was <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>, and let the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7972>send<s%> his <S%H7470>pleasure<s%> to us <S%H5922>concerning<s%> this <S%H1836>matter<s%>.
